node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `tomb` ( `node_id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `type_nodetype` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(240) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `author_user` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `killa_user` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `createtime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `hits` int DEFAULT '0', `reputation` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `data` text COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci, PRIMARY KEY (`node_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_unicode_ci PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: tomb
